Class Tile

java.lang.Object
  Tile

public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object

Tile is a class dedicated to tile objects for the Roll the Ball applet

Version:
1.0
Author:
Chris, Ronald, Matt, Ryan, Luis

Constructor Detail

Tile

public Tile()
Constructor that takes no arguments and sets all variables to false with the blank tile shape

Tile

public Tile(boolean start,
            boolean end,
            boolean right,
            boolean left,
            boolean up,
            boolean down,
            boolean star,
            TileShape shapeIn)
Constructor which takes input parameters to initialize instance variables

Parameters:
start - an indicator whether or not this tile is a start tile
end - an indicator whether or not this tile is a end tile
right - whether or not the tile can move right
left - whether or not the tile can move left
up - whether or not the tile can move up
down - whether or not the tile can move down
star - whether or not the tile contains a star
shapeIn - the shape for this tile object to be
